stitches.name: Chain
stitches.description: Foundation stitch for most crochet projects. Yarn over, pull through loop on hook.

stitches.name: Slip Stitch
stitches.description: Used to join rounds or move yarn without adding height. Insert hook, yarn over, pull through both loops.
stitches.notes: Keep tension loose to avoid puckering

stitches.name: Single Crochet
stitches.description: Basic stitch creating tight, dense fabric. Insert hook, yarn over, pull through, yarn over, pull through both loops.
stitches.notes: Great for amigurumi and sturdy fabrics. Bella Coco tutorial: UK Double = US Single Crochet.

stitches.name: Half Double Crochet
stitches.description: Medium height stitch. Yarn over, insert hook, yarn over, pull through, yarn over, pull through all 3 loops.
stitches.notes: Nice drape, between sc and dc in height. Bella Coco tutorial: UK Half Treble = US Half Double Crochet.

stitches.name: Double Crochet
stitches.description: Tall stitch with nice drape. Yarn over, insert, yarn over, pull through, (yarn over, pull through 2) twice.
stitches.notes: Most common stitch for blankets and garments. Bella Coco tutorial: UK Treble = US Double Crochet.

stitches.name: Treble Crochet
stitches.description: Very tall stitch. Yarn over twice, insert, yarn over, pull through, (yarn over, pull through 2) three times.
stitches.notes: Creates open, lacy fabric. Bella Coco tutorial: UK Double Treble = US Treble Crochet.

stitches.name: Shell Stitch
stitches.description: Multiple stitches worked into the same stitch creating a fan/shell shape. Usually 5 dc in one stitch.
stitches.notes: Beautiful for shawls and blanket edges. Olga Poltava tutorials excellent for this.

stitches.name: Granny Square
stitches.description: Classic motif worked in rounds. Clusters of dc separated by chain spaces, creating a square.
stitches.notes: Perfect for using up scrap yarn. Bella Coco tutorial excellent for beginners.

stitches.name: Bobble Stitch
stitches.description: Creates raised bumps. Work multiple incomplete dc in same stitch, then yarn over and pull through all loops.
stitches.notes: Uses more yarn but creates beautiful texture. Bella Coco tutorial.

stitches.name: V-Stitch
stitches.description: Creates V-shaped openwork. (dc, ch 1, dc) all in the same stitch or space.
stitches.notes: Great for light, airy shawls. Multiple tutorials: Hooked by Robin (quick scarf), Fiber Flux (one row repeat).

stitches.name: Pinwheel Motif
stitches.description: Decorative joined motifs with swirling pinwheel design. Creates beautiful lacy fabric for tablecloths and shawls.
stitches.notes: Olga Poltava tutorial. Complex join-as-you-go technique.

stitches.name: Flower Lattice
stitches.description: Open lattice pattern with small flower motifs at intersections. Creates elegant, drapey fabric for shawls.
stitches.notes: Yarnspirations floral shawl pattern. Free pattern available on their website.

stitches.name: Star Flower Stitch
stitches.description: Open lace pattern creating star and flower shapes. Beautiful for summer garments and shawls.
stitches.notes: Hopeful Turns tutorial. Creates very open, airy fabric.

stitches.name: Puff Stitch
stitches.description: Creates raised, puffy texture. Work multiple yarn overs and pulls in same stitch, then pull through all loops.
stitches.notes: Similar to bobble but typically shorter/rounder. Great for baby blankets.

stitches.name: Crossed Double Crochet
stitches.description: Double crochets worked in crossed pattern creating X shapes. Dense, woven appearance.
stitches.notes: Tejido a Crochet Mariam tutorial in Spanish. One-row repeat.

stitches.name: Flower Lace Triangle
stitches.description: Open lace pattern with flower motifs, worked in triangle shape. Creates elegant, airy fabric perfect for shawls.
stitches.notes: Future project - flower lace triangle shawl pattern.
